name: Summer's Ease
description:
Synopsis:

In Summer's Ease you attend a beach concert but it's about to close down if someone doesn't clean up all the mess. The more trash that is disposed of the better the concert can become and the more people will show up to enjoy. 

Key Features:
  • Evolving Environment - Improving Musically and Visually throughout play
  • Managing Trash in hand & out - Maintain the concert through the amount of trash left around and the rate at which it is thrown
  • Multiple Endings - 3 Endings for how well you maintain the concert
Credits

Game Developer - Reece L. Jones

Audio & Concept - Lochlan Walliker

Art - Ethan Dunnett

Additional Programming - Jack Yeomans, Morgan Dafnis, Tristan Riedel
